firstOnBoardingDesc: Discover a unique shopping experience with FruitHUB. Explore our wide selection of premium fresh fruits and enjoy the best deals with top-quality products.
secondOnBoardingDesc: We offer you the finest carefully selected fruits. Browse details, images, and reviews to make sure you choose the perfect fruit.
don'tWorryForgotPassword: Don't worry, just enter your phone number and we'll send a verification code.
enterCode: Enter the code we sent to the following email address
createNewPassword: Create a new password to log in
termsAndConditionsAgreement: By creating an account, you agree to our Terms and Conditions.
sorryThisInformationUnAvailable: Sorry... this information is currently unavailable.
